item.title: kitty + zsh + powerlevel10k = ✨ aesthetics ✨
item.description: Who doesn’t like a good looking terminal and useful layouts and keymaps? This has always been my goal since I started using linux as main OS. I have used lots of different terminals, plugins and settings over the years but I think now I achieved the glory with my current setup: Let’s have a look to the configuration. What do I use? Terminal: Kitty Shell: zsh zsh config management: Oh my Zsh!
